statements: SELECT * FROM playlist WHERE user_id = '1' AND album_id = '2';
SELECT song_name, album_name FROM playlist WHERE duration > 180;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_songs FROM playlist;
SELECT * FROM playlist ORDER BY album_name ASC, duration DESC;
SELECT song_name, duration FROM playlist WHERE user_id = '3' AND duration BETWEEN 200 AND 300;
SELECT * FROM playlist ORDER BY duration DESC, song_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT song_name, album_name, duration FROM playlist WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY album_name ASC
SELECT playlist_id, song_id, album_id, duration FROM playlist WHERE album_id = '78901234-1234-5678-9012-345678901234' ORDER BY playlist_id ASC
SELECT * FROM playlist WHERE duration > 300 ORDER BY user_id ASC, song_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM playlist ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT song_name, album_name FROM playlist WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM playlist WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY song_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT album_name FROM playlist;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS number_of_songs FROM playlist GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT song_name, album_name FROM playlist WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT song_name, album_name FROM playlist ORDER BY song_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM playlist WHERE album_name = 'Best Hits';
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlist ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, count(id) FROM playlist GROUP BY playlist_name;
SELECT playlist_name, song_name FROM playlist LEFT JOIN songs ON playlist.id = songs.playlist_id;
SELECT playlist_name, album_name, release_year FROM playlist JOIN albums ON playlist.id = albums.playlist_id ORDER BY release_year;
SELECT * FROM playlist WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT playlist_name FROM playlist WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT song_name, artist FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT playlist_id, album_name, release_year FROM albums WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT p.playlist_name, s.song_name, a.album_name FROM playlist p JOIN songs s ON p.id = s.playlist_id JOIN albums a ON p.id = a.playlist_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT playlist_id, user_id, song_id FROM playlist WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT song_name, artist FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT album_id, album_name, release_year FROM albums ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM playlist ORDER BY playlist_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT song_name, artist FROM songs WHERE artist='Ed Sheeran';
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM albums WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT u.username, s.song_name, a.album_name FROM users u JOIN playlist p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN songs s ON p.song_id = s.song_id JOIN albums a ON p.album_id = a.album_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.song_id) AS total_songs FROM users u JOIN playlist p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(p.song_id) > 10 ORDER BY total_songs DESC;
SELECT * FROM user;
SELECT song_id, title, artist FROM song ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM user WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT playlist_id, user_id, is_favorite FROM user_playlist WHERE is_favorite = TRUE;
SELECT title, release_date FROM album WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user;
SELECT song_id, title, artist FROM song WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT user_id, song_id, album_id FROM playlist ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user.username, playlist.user_id, song.title FROM user JOIN playlist ON user.user_id = playlist.user_id JOIN song ON playlist.song_id = song.song_id;
SELECT user.username, COUNT(user_playlist.playlist_id) AS playlist_count FROM user LEFT JOIN user_playlist ON user.user_id = user_playlist.user_id GROUP BY user.user_id ORDER BY playlist_count DESC;
